examples: Have you been invited to their party?
She very kindly invited me to lunch.
Muy amablemente me invitó a almorzar.
I'd have liked to have gone but I wasn't invited.
Me hubiera gustado ir pero no me invitaron.
My mother invited a few friends that she hadn't seen for 20 years.
Mi madre invitó a algunos amigos que no había visto en 20 años.
